pages.text: $(li)The Levitation Stone is an ancient stone that can be used to find the $(l:patchouli:structures/castle_in_the_sky)Castle in the Sky$(/l).$(br)$(li)Right click while you are holding it in your hand to to find the path to this unique structure.
$(li)Particles must to be enabled in video configuration to be able to see this cloud on the ground.
$(li)Once that you have one $(l)Ancient Stone$(), you can corrupt other $(l)Stones$() placing the Levitation Stone and a Stone in the $(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/crafting_table)Crafting Table$(/l).
